jp_text: 崖が崩れるぞ

en_text: When I had Echoes hear the sound of your heart beat,\N it also heard the ground cracking!
jp_text: 君の心臓の音を聞いた時―
google_translated: When you hear your heart sound-

en_text: Oh no!
jp_text: ない！

en_text: I-I don't have enough time!
jp_text:
こいつを離して
どこかにつかまらなくては！
google_translated:
Release this
Don't get caught somewhere!

en_text: It crumbled just like I said it would...
jp_text: 言ったとおり崩れただろ？
google_translated: It was broken as I said?

en_text: Not that it matters since you never listen to a word I say.
jp_text:
でも何を言ったって
分かんないんだよね 君は
google_translated:
But what did you say
I do not know

en_text: Does this mean he had already written it there?
jp_text:
康一君は私を救うことを
すでに考えていたというの？
google_translated:
Yasuichi saves me
Is he already thinking?

en_text: When I was trying to rip Echoes apart...
jp_text:
私が康一君を
殺そうとしている時―
google_translated:
I am I
When I'm trying to kill-

en_text: ...he put that sound effect on the rock beneath the cliff?
jp_text:
崖下の岩に あの文字を
貼りつけていたというの？
google_translated:
That character on the rock under the cliff
Did you paste it?

en_text: I-I've completely lost...
jp_text: か… 完全に私の負けだわ…

en_text: No... I lost from the moment I first laid eyes on him...
jp_text: いいえ 私は出会った時から―

en_text: Are you okay, Koichi?!
jp_text: あっ 仗助君！ 億泰君！

en_text: Josuke! Okuyasu!
jp_text: 大丈夫か 康一！

en_text: B-But... Now I like him even more!
jp_text: 遅いんだよ 来んのが もう！

en_text: ...makes me so happy!
jp_text:
康一君のことを思ってるだけで
幸せだわ！

en_text: She's got white hair now!
jp_text: 髪の毛が真っ白だぞ

en_text: But now that I'm lookin' at her... \NAin't that a smile on her face?
jp_text:
でもよぉ あの女
幸せそうに笑ってやしねえか？
google_translated:
But that woman
Do you laugh happily?

en_text: You're right. It's creeping me out...
jp_text: ホントだぜ ありゃ不気味だ

en_text: Let's get outta here!
jp_text:
（億泰）
ヒエッ 早く逃げよう！

en_text: Save me, Josuke!
jp_text:
（康一）
助けて 仗助君！

jp_text:
（ナレーション）
ボヨヨン岬

jp_text:
自殺しかけた
若い女を―

en_text: ...only for her to bounce off a rock and back onto the cliff with a "boing-boing!" sound.
